page.title: 11RECREATION using the country
page.content: The eastern part of the area is used by people from the town in their spare time. Riding is popular especially with young girls and boys and in addition to the riding schools, horses are stabled on many farms. People use the area for walking or jogging and in season enjoy collecting blackberries. It is also a good area for exercising dogs. Children use the area as a playground; enjoying such pastimes as stream jumping or playing on "tarzies"(ropes tied to a tree). Some areas are used as trials courses for motor-bikes or BMX bikes. Some people enjoy bird-watching while others use dogs and guns to go hunting.
